markdown:
| icon           = poe2 cloak_ajamuuts_stalking icon.png
| description    = Ajamuut's life was one of sacrifice. As the matron huntress it fell to her to feed her nomadic tribe. In order to provide she lived apart, tirelessly stalking the herds. Her tribe followed, always one horizon behind, so as not to disturb the hunt. When the tribe saw the glow of a distant fire they knew their huntress had made a kill, and moved forward. Arriving at the dying coals, they would find a fresh carcass, trussed and dressed. Ajamuut had invariably moved on.

Ajamuut was known for her ability to soundlessly approach her quarry and strike with deadly precision. The howling winds and bitter cold offered few second chances. This cloak helped conceal her, both on open tundra and und dark forests, as its subtle pattern disguised her silhouette from even the most keen-eyed prey.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Cape
